pr_title: Impove types incompatibility exception message in insert analyzer.

timeline.bodyText: Would it be possible to turn this into an analyzer test? (Cheaper to run)
timeline.author: mfussenegger

replies.bodyText: i deliberately wanted it to keep as an integration test, but probably it should be also fine to have it as the . analyzer test.  👍 will update
replies.author: kovrus
